forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a brilliant sun, casting a warm glow over the cityscape and reflecting off the bay. With a high of 64 degrees, you can expect an inviting atmosphere, though temperatures may dip slightly as the day progresses. A gentle west-southwest breeze dances through the streets at around 14 mph, occasionally picking up with gusts that remind you of the city's playful nature. The expansive blue sky hints at the promise of clarity, although a whisper of clouds lurks, suggestive of a slight chance of drizzle later in the night, where the temperature will comfortably settle around 54 degrees.

As you stroll through the bustling city, perhaps exploring the charming streets or relaxing in a nearby café, consider donning layers to navigate the mild warmth of the afternoon and the cool embrace of the evening. A light jacket over a comfortable shirt might serve well as you linger outdoors, soaking in the sights. While the marine layer hints at its presence in the distance, enveloping the Golden Gate Bridge in a soft haze, it remains a modest backdrop to the sun-kissed urban landscape. This is an ideal moment for a muted adventure; perhaps a leisurely walk along the waterfront to enjoy the golden reflections on the water, or a visit to a hidden gem of a bookstore where you can lose yourself in pages and time.
